sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import { Header } from "./Header";
import { HeroSection } from "./HeroSection";
import { SearchSection } from "./SearchSection";
import { PopularSection } from "./PopularSection";
import { Footer } from "./Footer";
import { RecipeCard } from './RecipeCard';
import { DishSlider } from "./DishSlider";

interface RecipeHomepageProps {}

export const RecipeHomepage: React.FC<RecipeHomepageProps> = () => {
  const indianDishes = [
    {
      image:
        "https://api.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets/TEMP/54edcc952a3db6b3d309240a48ec92fab604b0fe?placeholderIfAbsent=true&apiKey=b59f74ae8c9444f28ee33eff06842d33",
      title: "Paneer Butter Masala",
      price: "₹220",
      rating: 5,
      quantity: "300 ml",
      description: "Rich and creamy paneer dish for vegetarians.",
      imageAlt: "Paneer Butter Masala dish",
    },
    {
      image:
        "https://api.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets/TEMP/bcc56362158f843340ee59bb785976b555a69a4b?placeholderIfAbsent=true&apiKey=b59f74ae8c9444f28ee33eff06842d33",
      title: "Biryani",
      price: "₹180",
      rating: 4.5,
      quantity: "400gm",
      description: "Spiced rice with meat or vegetables.",
      imageAlt: "Biryani dish",
    },
    {
      image:
        "https://api.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets/TEMP/da246966ab365ae8562ebcb3ed05054f88c933b7?placeholderIfAbsent=true&apiKey=b59f74ae8c9444f28ee33eff06842d33",
      title: "Dal Makhani",
      price: "₹250",
      rating: 4.5,
      quantity: "300ml",
      description: "Slow-cooked black lentils in butter and cream.",
      imageAlt: "Dal Makhani dish",
    },
    {
      image:
        "https://api.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets/TEMP/6f4616f8abc0e04456be987d8c5e01af10099db4?placeholderIfAbsent=true&apiKey=b59f74ae8c9444f28ee33eff06842d33",
      title: "Rajma Chawal",
      price: "₹200",
      rating: 4.5,
      quantity: "300gm",
      description: "Kidney beans curry with steamed rice.",
      imageAlt: "Rajma Chawal dish",
    },
    {
    image: "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/4e/Butter_chicken.jpg/800px-Butter_chicken.pnghttps://images.unsplash.com/photo-1603894584373-5ac82b2ae398?w=600&auto=format&fit=crop&q=60&ixlib=rb-4.1.0&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8Mnx8QnV0dGVyJTIwQ2hpY2tlbnxlbnwwfHwwfHx8MA%3D%3D",
    title: "Butter Chicken",
    price: "₹350",
    rating: 4.8,
    quantity: "1 plate",
    description: "Rich and creamy chicken curry.",
    imageAlt: "Butter Chicken dish",
  },
  {
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1691171047345-dbcd78402f9e?w=600&auto=format&fit=crop&q=60&ixlib=rb-4.1.0&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8MTV8fEh5ZGVyYWJhZGklMjBCaXJ5YW5pfGVufDB8fDB8fHww",
    title: "Hyderabadi Biryani",
    price: "₹300",
    rating: 4.7,
    quantity: "1 plate",
    description: "Spicy and flavorful rice with meat.",
    imageAlt: "Hyderabadi Biryani",
  },
  {
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1668236543090-82eba5ee5976?w=600&auto=format&fit=crop&q=60&ixlib=rb-4.1.0&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8Mnx8TWFzYWxhJTIwRG9zYXxlbnwwfHwwfHx8MA%3D%3D",
    title: "Masala Dosa",
    price: "₹120",
    rating: 4.6,
    quantity: "1 piece",
    description: "Crispy crepe filled with spiced potatoes.",
    imageAlt: "Masala Dosa",
  },
  {
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1589647363585-f4a7d3877b10?w=600&auto=format&fit=crop&q=60&ixlib=rb-4.1.0&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8Mnx8UGFsYWslMjBQYW5lZXJ8ZW58MHx8MHx8fDA%3D",
    title: "Palak Paneer",
    price: "₹180",
    rating: 4.5,
    quantity: "1 bowl",
    description: "Paneer cubes in creamy spinach gravy.",
    imageAlt: "Palak Paneer",
  },
  {
    image: "https://media.istockphoto.com/id/2203561604/photo/delicious-food-chole-bhature.jpg?s=2048x2048&w=is&k=20&c=LHMtuJirvzrILP5skvPAZ69y3Jpe_qnBAX4E8jiL-Dc=",
    title: "Chole Bhature",
    price: "₹150",
    rating: 4.4,
    quantity: "1 plate",
    description: "Spicy chickpea curry with deep-fried bread.",
    imageAlt: "Chole Bhature",
  },
  ];

  const popularDrinks = [
    {
      image:
        "https://api.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets/TEMP/ff7af145002fc5783100643a965807c15cc3c41b?placeholderIfAbsent=true&apiKey=b59f74ae8c9444f28ee33eff06842d33",
      title: "Masala Chai",
      price: "₹30",
      rating: 5,
      quantity: "150 ml",
      description: "the perfect blend of spices Indian tea.",
      imageAlt: "Masala Chai",
    },
    {
      image:
        "https://api.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets/TEMP/b4140ff64c3499297175f14ecc4efe00fc06110c?placeholderIfAbsent=true&apiKey=b59f74ae8c9444f28ee33eff06842d33",
      title: "Mango Lassi",
      price: "₹90",
      rating: 5,
      quantity: "250 ml",
      description:
        '"Sweet, creamy, and refreshing – the king of summer drinks."',
      imageAlt: "Mango Lassi",
    },
    {
      image:
        "https://api.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets/TEMP/31f12bf9d42c21b4f9d781df7e00b1da2a2a3508?placeholderIfAbsent=true&apiKey=b59f74ae8c9444f28ee33eff06842d33",
      title: "Nimbu Pani",
      price: "₹50",
      rating: 4.5,
      quantity: "200 ml",
      description: '"Zesty. Cool. Refreshing – that\'s Nimbu Pani!"',
      imageAlt: "Nimbu Pani",
    },
    {
      image:
        "https://api.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets/TEMP/85c46a139316f3b9f44e8d2cf726371150773320?placeholderIfAbsent=true&apiKey=b59f74ae8c9444f28ee33eff06842d33",
      title: "Cold Coffee",
      price: "₹100",
      rating: 4.5,
      quantity: "250 ml",
      description: '"Your favorite coffee — chilled to perfection."',
      imageAlt: "Cold Coffee",
    },
    {
    image:"https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQGo8jttJx_y8Jl1MzmvvHoKLK8q9S1-ViPYQ&s",
    
    title: "Badam Milk",
    price: "₹70",
    rating: 5,
    quantity: "200 ml",
    description: "Warm milk with almond, saffron, and cardamom.",
    imageAlt: "Badam Milk",
  },
  {
    image: "https://www.indianveggiedelight.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/sweet-lassi-recipe-featured.jpg",
     
    title: "Sweet Lassi",
    price: "₹50",
    rating: 4,
    quantity: "300 ml",
    description: "Refreshing yogurt-based Punjabi drink.",
    imageAlt: "Sweet Lassi",
  },
  {
  image:"https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRHya3OCsaVAI74fyDzccwvv1IvN1mm-IlpwQ&s",
  title: "Rose Milk",
  price: "₹40",
  rating: 4,
  quantity: "250 ml",
  description: "Chilled milk flavored with rose syrup.",
  imageAlt: "Rose Milk",
},

  ];

  const italianDishes = [
    {
      image:
        "https://api.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets/TEMP/608636c956ec59063fecc3b46b4f1c7e8b0c5eff?placeholderIfAbsent=true&apiKey=b59f74ae8c9444f28ee33eff06842d33",
      title: "Pizza Margherita",
      price: "₹300",
      rating: 5,
      quantity: "8-inch",
      description: "Classic pizza with tomato, mozzarella, and basil",
      imageAlt: "Pizza Margherita",
    },
    {
      image:
        "https://api.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets/TEMP/3706c6aca37d6b4595afbddb05bc916c8ee58310?placeholderIfAbsent=true&apiKey=b59f74ae8c9444f28ee33eff06842d33",
      title: "Classic Veg Burger",
      price: "���120",
      rating: 5,
      quantity: "250gm",
      description: "Rich and creamy paneer dish for vegetarians.",
      imageAlt: "Classic Veg Burger",
    },
    {
      image:
        "https://api.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets/TEMP/83db21269758ca90c51399bf72606a64d2e56e85?placeholderIfAbsent=true&apiKey=b59f74ae8c9444f28ee33eff06842d33",
      title: "Veg Sushi Roll",
      price: "₹400",
      rating: 4.5,
      quantity: "6pieces",
      description: "Avocado, cucumber, and carrot with sesame",
      imageAlt: "Veg Sushi Roll",
    },
    {
      image:
        "https://api.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets/TEMP/84380bff704d915ef4c37ef2f644a5efcc5adda9?placeholderIfAbsent=true&apiKey=b59f74ae8c9444f28ee33eff06842d33",
      title: "Veggie Taco",
      price: "₹180",
      rating: 4.5,
      quantity: "2 pcs",
      description: "Sautéed veggies, beans, lettuce, and cheese",
      imageAlt: "Veggie Taco",
    },
    {
    image:"data:image/jhttps://www.vanillabeancuisine.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/Spaghetti-Alfredo-FEAT-IMAGE.jpgpeg;base64,://www.vanillabeancuisine.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/Spaghetti-Alfredo-FEAT-IMAGE.jpghttps://api.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets/TEMP/bb29738809b207a4745de3c80d5ad6ac294e1960?placeholderIfAbsent=true&apiKey=b59f74ae8c9444f28ee33eff06842d33",
    title: "Pasta Alfredo",
    price: "₹350",
    rating: 4,
    quantity: "1 bowl",
    description: "Creamy white sauce pasta with herbs and cheese",
    imageAlt: "Pasta Alfredo",
  },
  {
    image:
      "https://api.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets/TEMP/282cd917ef170e92c390d62efdf9d34e6e1a5ed7?placeholderIfAbsent=true&apiKey=b59f74ae8c9444f28ee33eff06842d33",
    title: "Lasagna",
    price: "₹400",
    rating: 5,
    quantity: "1 slice",
    description: "Layered pasta with cheese, tomato sauce, and vegetables",
    imageAlt: "Lasagna",
  },
  {
    image:
      "https://api.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets/TEMP/0c4ad71e45a1c3ff4ddfbe7cb5f9d81d3e062238?placeholderIfAbsent=true&apiKey=b59f74ae8c9444f28ee33eff06842d33",
    title: "Risotto Milanese",
    price: "₹370",
    rating: 4,
    quantity: "1 bowl",
    description: "Creamy saffron-flavored rice with parmesan cheese",
    imageAlt: "Risotto Milanese",
  },
  {
    image:
      "https://api.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets/TEMP/fd392a6fe2fc57a5ff05ce0ee56e20a78cc302c5?placeholderIfAbsent=true&apiKey=b59f74ae8c9444f28ee33eff06842d33",
    title: "Gnocchi Pomodoro",
    price: "₹320",
    rating: 4,
    quantity: "1 plate",
    description: "Soft potato dumplings in rich tomato sauce",
    imageAlt: "Gnocchi Pomodoro",
  },
  {
    image:
      "https://api.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets/TEMP/26dc0c1b2de7d76b50fdff59ed12365acbc129b5?placeholderIfAbsent=true&apiKey=b59f74ae8c9444f28ee33eff06842d33",
    title: "Eggplant Parmigiana",
    price: "₹340",
    rating: 4,
    quantity: "1 serving",
    description: "Baked eggplant with tomato sauce and mozzarella",
    imageAlt: "Eggplant Parmigiana",
  },
  ];


    return (
    <div className="overflow-hidden pb-7 bg-white">
      <Header />

      <main className="flex flex-col items-start px-10 mt-20 w-full max-md:px-5 max-md:mt-10 max-md:max-w-full">
        <HeroSection />
        <SearchSection />

        <DishSlider
          title="Popular Indian Dishes"
          icon="https://api.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets/TEMP/4883d06ae67fc1fca2e4f02519a9e968e18cd94d?placeholderIfAbsent=true&apiKey=b59f74ae8c9444f28ee33eff06842d33"
          items={indianDishes}
        />

        <DishSlider
          title="Top Italian Main Course Dishes"
          icon="https://api.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets/TEMP/c00bcfdddbb3433a9ce445b616a44a647c53c270?placeholderIfAbsent=true&apiKey=b59f74ae8c9444f28ee33eff06842d33"
          items={italianDishes}
        />

        <DishSlider
          title="Popular Drinks"
          icon="https://api.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets/TEMP/4883d06ae67fc1fca2e4f02519a9e968e18cd94d?placeholderIfAbsent=true&apiKey=b59f74ae8c9444f28ee33eff06842d33"
          items={popularDrinks}
        />

        <img
          src="https://api.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets/TEMP/2dbbc7a920cd678c21c4a74e94be9d8a8634d410?placeholderIfAbsent=true&apiKey=b59f74ae8c9444f28ee33eff06842d33"
          alt="Decorative food banner"
          className="object-contain self-center mt-32 w-full aspect-[3.38] max-w-[1583px] max-md:mt-10 max-md:max-w-full"
        />
      </main>

      <Footer />
    </div>
  );
};

export default RecipeHomepage;
